meanings.sent1: She misestimates the distance and always ends up taking longer to walk there.
meanings.sent2: He often misestimates how long it will take to finish his homework.
meanings.sent3: The cat misestimates the height of the table and fails to make the jump.
meanings.sent4: The detective misestimates the suspect's alibi and follows the wrong lead.
meanings.sent5: The weather forecast misestimates the chance of rain, and everyone gets caught in a sudden downpour.

meanings.sent1: His misestimates about the project's cost led to budget overruns.
meanings.sent2: The misestimates in the report caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: The misestimates in the recipe made the cake turn out too salty.
meanings.sent4: The misestimates in the survey skewed the results significantly.
meanings.sent5: The misestimates in the map led the hikers astray in the forest.
